name: Insectipede
detailed_description:
A New Retro Classic Centipede Arcade Game!

We’re Bugging Out!

Blast your way through waves of Centipedes and UFO’s in this fast paced 80’s style modern remake.

FEATURES

- A Modern Version of an Arcade Classic.
- 50 Challenging Stages with Vibrant Colors.
- Waves of Centipedes and UFOs.
- Arcade High Scores.
- Power-Ups.
- Gamepad Support.


Time To Bug Out… Are You Ready For It?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
